title: Elite Gourmet ETO490 9L/4 Slice Countertop Toaster Oven with 30-Minute Timer, Adjustable Temperature Control, Includes Baking Pan and Wire Rack, Bake, Broil, Toast, Black
description: Stay toasty with the Elite Gourmet 9L/4 slice toaster oven. Toast bagels and bread, bake a personal pizza, roast chicken & beef or broil an open-faced sandwich. With an adjustable 30-min timer and temperature control up to 450°F, cooking is fast and easy. The compact & powerful design gives you options for use in smaller spaces but also provides plenty of power to cook complete meals. Cleanup and storage are simple and hassle-free. The attractive Matte Black finish makes this toaster oven the perfect addition to any kitchen.
